tile.guides: Tirohia ngā Kāri me Ngā Kupu Arataki
ttt.title: Ko ngā Mea hei Whakamātau
ttt.subTitle: He maha ngā ara ki te tīmata i a Scratch. Pāwhiritia te pikitia mō te Akoako. Tikina ake rānei Ngā Kawenga Kāri me ngā Aratohu Kaiwhakaako mō ia kaupapa.
ttt.tutorialSubtitle: Ako ki te waihanga i tēnei hinonga, whāia ngā tohutohu o tēnei akomanga Scratch.
ttt.activitySubtitle: Toro atu i ngā whakaaro waehere hou, mā ēnei kāri pikitia, ka taea te tā.
ttt.educatorSubtitle: Whakamahia tēnei Arataki Kaiwhakaako hei mahere, hei whakahaere hoki i te akoako, kia kotahi te hāora mō Scratch.
ttt.MakeItFlyDescription: Whakahākoritia Scratch te Ngeru, Ngā Kōtiro Powerpuff, he taco noa nei!
ttt.AnimateYourNameDescription: Whakahākoritia ngā reta o tō tohu tuakiri, kārangaranga, tino kupu rānei.
ttt.RaceDescription: Waihangatia he kēmu kia whakataetae ngā kaiwhakaari e rua ki te oma.
ttt.MakeMusicDescription: Kōwhiritia he taonga pūoro, tāpiritia he oro, pēhia ngā kī hoki ki te whakatangi.
ttt.HideAndSeekDescription: Waihangatia he kēmu tauhunahuna, ka ngaro, ka puta hoki ngā kaiwhakaari.
ttt.StoryDescription: Kōwhirihia ngā kaiwhakaari, whakaurua he kōrero, kia whai oranga tō kōrero paki.
ttt.FashionDescription: Waihangatia tētahi kēmu ka kākahutia te kaiwhakaari i ngā momo kākahu maha.
ttt.PongDescription: Waihangatia he kēmu tāwhana pōro, me ngā pūoro, piro, aha rānei.
ttt.DanceDescription: Hoahoaina he kanikani hākorikori, me ngā pūoro, me ngā takahanga waewae.
ttt.CatchDescription: Waihangatia he kēmu, kia hopu koe i ngā taonga e takataka iho i te rangi.
ttt.VirtualPetDescription: Waihangatia he mōkai pāhekoheko, ka taea te kai, te inu, te tākaro ana hoki
